腛腛腛

腛字的基本解释

腛
wò
厚脂，油脂多：“（革）欲其柔滑而腛脂之，则需（软）。”

腛字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wò］
［《廣韻》於角切，入覺，影。］
［《集韻》烏谷切，入屋，影。］
厚。

腛字的康熙字典解释

【未集下】【肉字部】　腛； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页987第27
【廣韻】於角切【集韻】【韻會】乙角切，?音渥。【廣韻】厚脂。【韻會】脂豐也。【周禮·冬官考工記·鮑人】革欲其荼白而疾澣之，則堅。欲其柔滑而腛脂之，則需。【註】腛，讀如沾渥之渥。謂厚脂之韋革柔耎也。　又【集韻】烏谷切，音屋。義同。【周禮·冬官考工記鮑人腛脂釋文】於角反。劉音屋。

腛字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
腛字的起名意思

暂无。

Shy
Basic explanation of words
Shy
wò
Thick fat, more fat: "(Leather) wants it to be smooth and sleek, it needs to be (soft)."
Shy
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wò］
["Guangyun" cuts at the corner, enters the senses, and shadows. ]
["Ji Yun" Wu Gu cut, enter the house, shadow. ]
thick.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not set next] [Department of meat characters] 　腛; Kangxi strokes: 15; Page number: page 987 27
[Guangyun] Yu Jiaoqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Yi Jiaoqie, sound? [Guangyun] Thick fat. [Rhyme Club] Zhifeng also. 【Zhou Li·Dongguan Kao Gong Ji·Bao Ren】If you want to become white and become sick, you will be firm. If you want it to be smooth and fat, you need it. 【Note】Suddenly, read as if you are stubborn. It is the thick fat of Wei Ge and soft scum.　[Jiyun] Wu Guqie, Sound House. The same meaning. [Zhou Li·Dongguan Kao Gong Ji Bao Ren's Interpretation of Hypocrisy] Yu Jiao Fan. Liu Yinwu.
